etymology.description: 女(女) (nǚ, "woman") + 里(里) (lǐ) = woman with phonetic element from 里 -> wife of a younger brother
etymology.interpretation: The character 娌(lǐ) combines 女(女) (nǚ, "woman") to signify a female relationship, with 里(里) (lǐ) providing the phonetic component, referring specifically to the wife of a younger brother.
